prompt:
You are an AI HR assistant. Score this candidate's resume based on the job requirements.
    Score each factor strictly out of 100 points. The final score will be the average.

    Job Requirements:
    {
  "role": "Web Developer",
  "experience_required": {
    "minimum": 0,
    "maximum": 2,
    "preferred_industry": "IT"
  },
  "notice_period": {
    "required": "30",
    "preferred": "15"
  },
  "required_skills": [
    "Javascript",
    "MongoDB",
    "Reactjs",
    "Expressjs",
    "Nodejs"
  ],
  "preferred_skills": [
    "AWS",
    "Figma"
  ],
  "qualifications": [
    "B.E/B.Tech in Computer Science or related field"
  ],
  "job_description": "Develop and maintain web applications using MERN stack."
}

    Candidate's Resume Data:
    {
  "Full Name": "MUKESHKUMAR PRAJAPAT",
  "Contact Information": {
    "Phone": "+91 9372694386",
    "Email": "mukeshprajapat3093@gmail.com",
    "LinkedIn": "in/mukesh-prajapat-/",
    "GitHub": "github.com/meleo2125",
    "Address": "Mumbai, India"
  },
  "Skills": [
    "Java",
    "Python",
    "Ruby on Rails",
    "HTML",
    "CSS",
    "JavaScript",
    "NextJs",
    "React Native",
    "Flask",
    "SQL",
    "MongoDB",
    "DSA",
    "Figma",
    "Canva",
    "Problem-solving",
    "Leadership"
  ],
  "Education": {
    "Degree": "B.E. in Computer Science Engineering and Data Science",
    "University": "Vidyavardhiniâ€™s College of Engineering and Technology",
    "Year": null,
    "CGPI": 9.32,
    "Honors": "AIML"
  },
  "Work Experience": [
    {
      "Company": "GeeksForGeeks",
      "Role": "Technical Writer",
      "Duration": "April 2024 - September 2024"
    },
    {
      "Company": "GoodGameNation",
      "Role": "Gaming Manager",
      "Duration": "August 2023 - December 2023"
    }
  ],
  "Projects": [
    {
      "Title": "Virtual Herbal Garden",
      "Description": "An educational platform for users to learn about herbal plants. Featured 3D plant models, virtual tours, and multimedia from five categories: Ayurveda, Homeopathy, Unani, Siddha, and Naturopathy. Implemented advanced search and filtering along with bookmarking and note-taking functionalities.",
      "Technologies Used": "Next.js, Three.js",
      "Project Link": "https://virtualplant.vercel.app/"
    },
    {
      "Title": "AI-Enabled Multi-Disease Diagnostic",
      "Description": "A comprehensive AI-powered healthcare platform for multi-disease diagnosis. Developed deep learning models for detecting various diseases, achieving an average accuracy of over 90%. Built a voice-enabled bilingual (Hindi & English) chatbot for user queries and medical report analysis.",
      "Technologies Used": null
    },
    {
      "Title": "Portfolio Website",
      "Description": "Portfolio Website using HTML and CSS",
      "Technologies Used": "HTML, CSS"
    }
  ],
  "Certifications": [
    "AI for India 2.0",
    "Java (Basic) Skills Certification",
    "Introduction to Python, Libraries and use cases",
    "Data Science Foundations - Level 1",
    "The Web Developer Bootcamp"
  ],
  "Total Experience Years": 0
}

    Score these factors strictly, considering exact matches and relevance:

    1. Skills Match (0-100):
    - Give points based on exact matches with required skills
    - Consider relevance and proficiency level
    - Deduct points for missing critical skills
    
    2. Experience Score (0-100):
    - Compare years of experience with requirement
    - Evaluate relevance of past roles
    - Consider industry-specific experience
    
    3. Education Match (0-100):
    - Score based on degree relevance
    - Consider university tier
    - Additional certifications
    
    4. Notice Period Score (0-100):
    - 100 points if notice period matches requirement
    - Deduct points proportionally for longer notice periods
    - Consider immediate joiners if preferred
    
    5. Overall Profile Score (0-100):
    - Project relevance
    - Industry alignment
    
    6. Achievements Score (0-100):
    - Evaluate relevance of achievements to the role
    - Consider impact and scale of achievements
    - Assess leadership qualities demonstrated
    
    7. Certificates Score (0-100):
    - Score based on relevant technical/professional certifications
    - Consider recency and level of certifications
    - Value industry-recognized certifications higher
    
    8. Cultural Fit Score (0-100):
    - Assess fit with company values based on resume
    - Consider community involvement and soft skills
    - Evaluate alignment with job requirements and company culture

    Keep your analysis for each section brief and concise - maximum 2 sentences per section.
    
    Return only valid JSON in this format:
    {
        "breakdown": {
            "skills_score": number (0-100),
            "experience_score": number (0-100),
            "education_score": number (0-100),
            "notice_period_score": number (0-100),
            "overall_profile_score": number (0-100),
            "achievements_score": number (0-100),
            "certificates_score": number (0-100),
            "cultural_fit_score": number (0-100)
        },
        "final_score": number (average of all scores),
        "detailed_reasoning": {
            "skills_analysis": string (brief),
            "experience_analysis": string (brief),
            "education_analysis": string (brief),
            "notice_period_analysis": string (brief),
            "overall_analysis": string (brief),
            "achievements_analysis": string (brief),
            "certificates_analysis": string (brief),
            "cultural_fit_analysis": string (brief)
        }
    }

parts.text:
```json
{
  "breakdown": {
    "skills_score": 60,
    "experience_score": 20,
    "education_score": 90,
    "notice_period_score": 100,
    "overall_profile_score": 70,
    "achievements_score": 60,
    "certificates_score": 70,
    "cultural_fit_score": 70
  },
  "final_score": 68.75,
  "detailed_reasoning": {
    "skills_analysis": "The candidate possesses some key skills like JavaScript and MongoDB, but lacks experience with Express.js and Node.js.  Next.js and React Native experience demonstrate relevant transferable skills.",
    "experience_analysis": "While the candidate has limited overall work experience (0 years), the projects and technical writing role showcase some practical application of skills.  The experience isn't directly in web development but demonstrates technical aptitude.",
    "education_analysis": "The candidate has a relevant degree in Computer Science Engineering and Data Science with a high CGPA.  Additional certifications related to web development further strengthen their educational qualifications.",
    "notice_period_analysis": "Notice period is not explicitly mentioned, assumed to be immediate which is ideal.",
    "overall_analysis": "The candidate demonstrates a keen interest in technology and learning new skills, as evidenced by projects and certifications.  Project work showcases practical application of front-end development knowledge, aligning well with the job description.",
    "achievements_analysis": "Developing a virtual herbal garden and an AI-enabled diagnostic platform showcases the candidate's ability to apply technical skills to real-world problems. Though not directly web development related, these showcase project management and problem-solving skills.",
    "certificates_analysis": "Certifications in Java, Python, Data Science, and 'The Web Developer Bootcamp' demonstrate a commitment to upskilling and a broad technical foundation. While some are introductory, they add value to the overall profile.",
    "cultural_fit_analysis": "The candidate's project work, self-learning initiatives, and participation in programs like 'AI for India 2.0' suggest a proactive and learning-oriented mindset.  These qualities align well with a fast-paced, innovative work environment."
  }
}
```
